Roles.OrganizationLongEn: Senate
Roles.OrganizationLongFr: Sénat
Roles.NotesEn: From the opening of the 6th Parliament until Abbott took office, the duties of leader were carried out by Hon. Frank Smith.  The death of Macdonald on June 6,  1891 dissolved his Ministry.  Abbott formed the new Government which took office on June 16, 1891.  He resigned as Prime Minister on December 5, 1892.
Roles.NotesFr: Du début de 6e Parlement jusqu'à ce qu'Abbott devienne Premier ministre le 16 juin 1891, les fonctions de Leader du gouvernement au Sénat sont remplies par l'hon. Frank Smith.  Abbott démissionne comme Premier ministre le 5 décembre 1892.

• First Prime Minister born in Canada
